title: A RESOLUTION APPROVING AND ADOPTING THE LOS BANOS GAD FOCAL POINT SYSTEM - EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE (GFPS - EXECOM) RESOLUTION NO. 2025 - 01 DATED AUGUST 27, 2025 ENTITLED: “RESOLUTION REALIGNING SEVERAL APPROPRIATIONS UNDER THE GENDER AND DEVELOPMENT (GAD) FUND FOR FY 2025 AMOUNTING TO TWO MILLION NINE HUNDRED THOUSAND PESOS AND 00/100 (PHP 2,900,000.00) AND THEREAFTER ALLOCATING AND APPROVING THE SAME FOR VARIOUS PURPOSES”. Author
